summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Fourteenth Avenue Northeast, from Northlake Avenue to the existing pavement at Brintnall Place, all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 5420 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
